I have added Insights and Feedback on The Incredible Wizard and Wizard of W=
or (Coin-Op) by Tim Duarte.


Tim wrote feedback for the Bally Alley Astroc=
ast #6 podcast, which included a review of The Incredible Wizard.  Tim took=
 this feedback, added some pictures to jazz it up a bit, and then formatted=
 it into an article in the tradition of his classic print newsletter The 26=
00 Connection.  You can read it here:


http://www.ballyalley.com/documenta=
tion/reviews/reviews.html#IncredibleWizardInsightsandFeedback


Enjoy!


Ad=
am

--_000_CY4PR1601MB114198FBED1A497F4263A1CDC88D0CY4PR1601MB1141_
